column2:
plot_ly(dfbri, x =~dfbri$Date) %>% 
  add_lines( y =~dfbri[,2], name = "BBRI") %>% 
  layout(
    title = "        BBRI",
    xaxis = list(
      rangeselector = list(
        buttons = list(
          list(
            count = 1,
            label = "1 month",
            step = "month",
            stepmode = "backward"
          ),
          list(
            count = 3, 
            label = "3 month",
            step = "month",
            stepmode = "backward"),
          list(
            count = 6,
            label = "6 month",
            step = "month",
            stepmode = "backward"),
          list(
            count = 12,
            label = "1 year",
            step = "month",
            stepmode = "backward"
          ),
          list(
            count = 60,
            label = "5 year",
            step = "month",
            stepmode = "backward"
          )
        )), title = "Date"),
    rangeslider = list(type = "date"),
    yaxis = list(title = "Price")
)

Warning: 'layout' objects don't have these attributes: 'rangeslider'
Valid attributes include:
